channel.title: First wasteland 2, now carmageddon? The 90's are back!
channel.description:
So, I'm sure a lot of you have known about Wasteland 2 being on kickstarter, but the EXTREMELY WONDERFUL NEWS is that Stainless Games have put their Carmageddon: Reincarnation on kickstarter as well!
Here's the link if you're interested [url]https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/stainlessgames/carmageddon-reincarnation[/url]
It has actually been in some kind of development process for a year our so, and they say they'll release it in February 2013 via steam if they reach the goal!
Attention all competitors: This is your one minute warning. Ah, memories.

item.title: First wasteland 2, now carmageddon? The 90's are back!
item.dc:creator: trunk_slamchest
item.description:
the erection i have is surprising yet comforting…for multiple reasons…

lets kickstart a charity drive to put the gaben into the new carmageddon. and lets do it on kickstarter.

Read full topic

item.title: First wasteland 2, now carmageddon? The 90's are back!
item.dc:creator: Charchar
item.description:
Oh man, the first two carmageddon’s were excellent games… the third one, not so much, it was still good tho.

And wasteland 2, never played the original, but anything pre fallout 3 related is very, really, super welcome

item.title: First wasteland 2, now carmageddon? The 90's are back!
item.dc:creator: Mxo
item.description:
Try playing Carmageddon 2 : Carpocalypse now. I found it even better. It’s not just an update version though, it’s a brand new game.

item.title: First wasteland 2, now carmageddon? The 90's are back!

item.description:
I played the original Carmageddon on an emulator recently and liked it, so I’m excited there’s an updated version being worked on.
